posts.post_content:
Group of cards available for sale. 

Prices listed include shipping, unless you are in Canada.....then let me know.  Also, payment preference is Paypal F&F.....

Any "I will take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations.

And of course, I'm always listening to offers.

$SOLD - Lee Quillen SGC 40 Sovereign 350
$SOLD - Jap Barbeau SGC 30
$SOLD -  Jeff Sweeney SGC 20
